properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM EIGHT
METER S/V LITTLE BIGORNEAU IN AREA WITHIN FIVE
MILES OF 45-40.87N 012-14.60W AT 012101Z AUG.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0025, E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
